title: Bug 17277Java Editor: converting line delimiters and undo
description: Bug 17277Java Editor: converting line delimiters and undo My test file had 3000 lines :)
OB: If I convert line delimiters for a file and then choose 'undo' only the lastdelimiter is changed.
SR: If I convert line delimiters for a file and then choose 'undo' only the lastdelimiter is changed.
